title: Zuckerberg Drops A Bombshell About The Rigged Election (Ep 1839)
description:
In this episode, I address the disturbing new revelations from Mark Zuckerberg about FBI efforts to rig the 2020 election.

News Picks:

New FBI whistleblower comes forward claiming bureau told staff not to look at the laptop hard drive.

Did the FBI try to set up two GOP senators?

Facebook’s Zuckerberg told Joe Rogan Facebook censored the Hunter Biden story.

Why is the federal government colluding with big tech to censor free speech?

Did the swamp delay the launch of the vaccine to rig the election?



Yes, we’re in a recession. And the numbers tell the story. 


Texas Bans BlackRock and Other Financial Firms Over ESG Energy Crisis.


John Stossel Breaks Down 5 Myths of Socialism; Yet Young Americans Still Attracted To Failed, Deadly System - The Political Insider
